## ShaderHelper.prepareFragmentShader() method

Prepares the fragment shader which is going to be used in our material system

**Signature:**

```typescript
static prepareFragmentShader(pb: ProgramBuilder, ctx: DrawContext): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pb | [ProgramBuilder](doc/markdown/./device.programbuilder.md) | The program builder |
|  ctx | [DrawContext](doc/markdown/./scene.drawcontext.md) | The drawing context |

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

This function will setup all nessesary uniforms acoording to the drawing context
